message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $82.50?

Hi Bob, I understand your offer, but I'm not willing to go as low as $82.50. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think $87.50 is a more reasonable price for this product. It's still a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll love it.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go as low as $83?

Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, but I'm not willing to go as low as $83. I'm willing to compromise and offer you a deal at $86. I think this is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let me know if you're interested.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not comfortable with $86. Would you be willing to meet me at $84?

Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to find a sweet spot, but I'm not willing to go as low as $84. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer you a deal at $85.50. I think this is the best I can do, and I'm confident you'll love the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $84.50?

Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, but I'm not willing to go as low as $84.50. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer you a deal at $84.75. I think this is the best I can do, and I'm confident you'll love the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Unfortunately, I think I've reached my limit. I'm going to have to pass on this deal and look elsewhere.
